God Almighty, the Creator was manifest in the flesh. He came into the world to take away the sin of the world. He gave up his own life to save yours. John 1:1-3,10 KJV
In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. [2] The same was in the beginning with God. [3] All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made. [10] He was in the world, and the world was made by him, and the world knew him not.

comment:
1st of all I LOVE your videos. Always SO incredibly interesting!
Now to my feelings about people like Amber:
HOW DO PEOPLE LIKE THIS WOMAN SLEEP AT NIGHT?! Domestic violence isn't a club or brownie points. REAL domestic violence is unbelievably horrifying and from my experience usually it takes a while before you can delve into the extent of the trauma instead of word vomiting bullshit, followed by popping your head up from time to time to see who believes you (ALMOST NO ONE AMBER) and who can see right through you. I won't go much into my past but I'll skim the surface. I was abused and almost died along with my child. I was stabbed directly into my stomach at 8 months pregnant with a box cutter. I'd been reporting these incidents and the police would arrest him sure but he was out almost always WITHIN A DAY which was UNREAL. Piss him off and put him back on the streets within hours ALL without contacting me to warn me which led to the last event I just described. We both made it out alive thank you God, finally he is in prison and we have a restraining order FOR LIFE if he's to ever parole out, AND THESE ARE THE DISGUSTING HUMAN BEINGS THAT MAKE IT SO HARD FOR REAL VICTIMS TO BE TAKEN SERIOUSLY. Every girl who gets the side eye from a cop (RIGHTFULLY SO) when she is DESPERATELY needing help, we can thank this horrible person and every girl out there like her. THANK YOU TO THE AMBER HEARDS OF THE WORLD! JUST KNOW you LITERALLY have blood on your hands when police are rightfully skeptical and true victims die from that skepticism that MUST be there. HE was the abuse victim. HE WAS THE VICTIM. To PERVERT these social political movement for your own sick and twisted reasons is just as bad as perpetrating these types of crimes yourself. Never forget folks, SHE'S DONE BOTH THOSE THINGS HERE. End her career and her platform. Obviously she can't use that social status CORRECTLY so time to take it back. Below is me. Ask me anything. I'll be able to tell you every millisecond of what I experienced. I can still smell and taste it. It's an agony I'll never forget or have to "try" and remember. https://youtu.be/0AyNyTuteTg

She brought this all on herself because she couldn't accept being the one that was left. I don't care who filed, Johnny left HER and she couldn't stand it. So, she decided to ruin his life. So glad to see him getting justice in the eye of the public.
